readable.title: 3480051754_18e5802558
readable.content: A crowd of dark skinned people standing outside of white tents . A group of people stand and sit on the dirt near a line of several white tents . A group of refugees and sitting next to their tents . People are gathered by a tree beside a line of white tents . Some people sit , and some stand in a group of families before a background of white tents with UN markings .
